resources.string: #SOS #emergency Hello. This message is an SOS! Someone you know has placed you on the Beacon\'s emergency contact list!
#SOS #emergency This message is an SOS! Someone you know is in desperate need!
#EndSOS The SOS is now ending. Please make ensure the individual who had sent this SOS to you is safe.
